entry.title: $1741 // $1741 2BR Apt in Downtown Brooklyn
entry.content:
2BR Apt in Downtown Brooklyn available for sublet Sept 1st-April 2019 - please DM for details. Rent $3483 NET ($1741 per person). Rooms are very evenly divided perfect for two roommates. Very convenient location within 6 minute walk to Q/R/A/C/F/4/5 subways. Across the street from City Point with food court, movie theater, target, century 21, etc.

Can come with furniture if needed. We are looking because one of us is relocating for work.

24 hour doorman
laundry in unit
free gym/2 lounges including rooftop with Manhattan view, wet bar, game room, etc.
